https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/zpInbGtvCXQrNGvS0XWp6EPd7rh.jpg In front of an angry audience somewhere in Latin America, a North American discloses the secret network that used the World Bank, payoffs, extortion and sex, military coups and political assassinations to create the American empire. The definitive answer to President Bush's question: "why do they hate us?" Confessions of an Economic Hit Man
